title: Magic Display
summary: Download now and enjoy Magic Display !
description: Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Magic Display is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.With round shapes and amazing colors, our latest Watch Face will definitely be your favorite. Download it now and have fun.How to setup Magic Display:★ Install Android Wear first!★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Magic Display.★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered! You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Magic Display app settings menu.Magic Display is compatible with:★ ASUS ZENWATCH★ LG G WATCH R★ MOTO 360★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3★ LG G WATCH★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Magic Display is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
With round shapes and amazing colors, our latest Watch Face will definitely be your favorite. Download it now and have fun.
How to setup Magic Display:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Magic Display.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Magic Display app settings menu.
Magic Display is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Just horrible Quality is bad on my 360. It's not even closed to being aligned correctly. The to of the face shows up half way down my moto. Not good. Does not even look good either.
